definition: A term used to describe someone who is always ready and willing to assist others, often going out of their way to offer help and support in various situations. This word typically refers to a positive and helpful attitude towards others.

examples.german: Sie war sehr hilfsbereit und hat mir geholfen.
examples.english: She was very helpful and helped me.

examples.german: Die hilfsbereite Nachbarin hat mir beim Umzug geholfen.
examples.english: The helpful neighbor helped me with the move.
